Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
crappy \crap"py\ (kr[a^]p"p[y^]), a. of very poor quality. [slang]
Syn: lousy; crummy. [PJC]
crappy adj : very bad; "a lousy play"; "it's a stinking world" [syn: {icky}, {lousy}, {rotten}, {shitty}, {stinking}, {stinky}]
